doc.field: Items in this collection do not circulate and may be used in-house only.
Arabian “Hindu” bathing on deck of S.S. Ozarda
Sheep on board deck of S.S. Ozarda [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Our fellow passengers crossing the Red Sea]
Caravan in Wadi Araba, Lowell Thomas on camel in foreground with back to camera
Camel caravan in Wadi Araba, Lowell Thomas on camel in foreground [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: A camel caravan in the Wadi Araba]
British soldiers in automobile talking to Bedouins
Arab prison camp, guard with rifle in foreground
Emir Feisal and T. E. Lawrence holding morning audience outdoors in front of tents, distant view
Bedouin department store, outdoor gathering, automobile in foreground
Airplane at Akaba, two men in cockpits
Eve’s Tomb, Jedda [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: The last resting-place of the Mother of us all]

Large hotel, Jedda [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: The Waldorf-Astoria of Arabia-including 200 rooms with accommodations for 1000 guests with all the latest Arabian conveniences excepting bath, ‘phone, light, heat, or service]
T. E. Lawrence standing, three quarter length [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: The archeologist and poet who turned soldier]
T. E. Lawrence standing, three quarter length [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: The archeologist and poet who turned soldier]
T. E. Lawrence standing on balcony in Arab robe and headdress, full figure [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: The “Uncrowned King” of the Arabs on the Governor’s balcony in Jerusalem]
T. E. Lawrence standing outdoors on a prayer rug [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Lawrence in front of his headquarters tent]
T. E. Lawrence standing outdoors on a prayer rug [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Lawrence in front of his headquarters tent]
T. E. Lawrence, D. G. Hogarth, Allan Dawnay, full figure [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Colonel Lawrence conferring with Commander D. G. Hogarth, one of his advisers at the Arab Bureau in Cairo

T. E. Lawrence, D. G. Hogarth, full figure, Allan Dawnay cropped out of photograph [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Colonel Lawrence conferring with Commander D. G. Hogarth, one of his advisers at the Arab Bureau in Cairo
T. E. Lawrence, D. G. Hogarth, Allan Dawnay, close-up
T. E. Lawrence in British uniform, grinning, three quarter figure [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Lawrence at headquarters in Cairo]
T. E. Lawrence in British uniform, full figure
T. E. Lawrence in British uniform, full figure [copy, cropped]
T. E. Lawrence and his bodyguard in the desert [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: “Sidi” Lawrence and his “Sons”]
T. E. Lawrence and his bodyguard in the desert [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: “Sidi” Lawrence and his “Sons”]
T. E. Lawrence and two Syrian advisors [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Lawrence confers with Arab Nationalists leaders from Bagdad and Damascus]
T. E. Lawrence and six of his British staff in front of tent [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: T. E. Lawrence in chair surrounded by members of his British staff]
T. E. Lawrence and six of his British staff in front of tent [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: T. E. Lawrence in chair surrounded by members of his British staff]

T. E. Lawrence in white robe, ends of headdress back over shoulders, hands clasped, sword at waist, three quarter length [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: In his white robes Lawrence looked like a prophet]
T. E. Lawrence in paisley robe, squatting, full-faced, close-up [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Col. T. E. Lawrence]
T. E. Lawrence in paisley robe, squatting, full-faced, close-up [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Col. T. E. Lawrence]
T. E. Lawrence sitting on floor, toe of boot showing
T. E. Lawrence in white robe, three quarter side view, left hand on sword [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: The King-maker]
T. E. Lawrence in white robe, three quarters side view, left hand on sword [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: The King-maker]
T. E. Lawrence in white robe, three quarters front, hands behind back, headdress over shoulders, sword at waist
T. E. Lawrence in paisley robe, three quarter view, both hands on sword, full-faced [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Colonel T. E. Lawrence, the mystery man of Arabia]
T. E. Lawrence in white robe, three quarter view, full-faced, head cloth hanging down [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: “Shereef” Lawrence]
T. E. Lawrence in white, three quarter side view, hands clasped over knee
T. E. Lawrence in white robe with sword at waist, sitting on floor, side view, right hand on chin [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: The dreamer whose dreams came true]
T. E. Lawrence in white, three quarter view, sitting on stool, sword at waist
T. E. Lawrence in paisley robe, side view, holding book, sword at waist (Graphlex)
T. E. Lawrence, full length, white robe, sword at waist (Graphlex)
T. E. Lawrence, full length, white robe, sword at waist (Graphlex)
Colonel P. C. Joyce, second in command to T. E. Lawrence [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Colonel Joyce, Commander of the Arab “Regulars”]
Hussein Ibn Ali, King of the Hedjaz [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: King of the Hejaz, “Commander of the Faithful,” and founder of a new Arabian dynasty]
Hussein Ibn Ali, King of the Hedjaz [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: King of the Hejaz, “Commander of the Faithful,” and founder of a new Arabian dynasty]
Emir Feisal [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Emir Feisal, now King of Mesopotamia (Irak)]
T. E. Lawrence and Emir Feisal at right conferring with Bedouin sheiks [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Feisal and Lawrence conferring with Bedouin Sheiks]
T. E. Lawrence and Emir Feisal conferring with Bedouin sheiks
Auda Abu Tayi, center, and two brothers [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Sheik Auda Abu Tayi, the Bedouin Robin Hood]
Mounted Bedouins [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Bedouin “Irregulars” ready for a raid on the Turks]
Scottish soldiers talking to Arabs, Akaba
Arab and Egyptian guards sitting in front of hut at an oasis
Bedouin with curls [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: A brigand from Jebel Druz]
Arab man [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: A Sheik of Araby]
Bedouin sheik on horse [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Tallal El-Hareidhin of Tafas]
Bedouin with curls holding rifle [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: An Arab Apollo]
Druses from Hauran [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Druses from the Hauran]
Crowd of Bedouins squatting and standing, Solomon’s Mountains in background
Bedouin barber shop at an oasis
Scottish soldiers and Arabs at Akaba
Head of Gulf of Akaba from shore, two ships in distance
British cruiser off Arabian coast, man in foreground
Akaba waterfront [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Shore-line at the head of the Gulf of Akaba]
Akaba waterfront [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Shore-line at the head of the Gulf of Akaba]
Akaba, looking down from housetop, ship in distance
Women carrying fuel on shore of Akaba
Squatting Bedouins, close-up, with camels at Akaba
Mazuk, vain Bedouin on Emir Feisal’s staff
Distant view of camp beneath cliff at Gueira, men standing in left foreground
Arab store, horse eating in foreground, Lowell Thomas at right
Malud Bey and Arab cavalry leaders
Arab cavalry under Malud Bey [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Malud Bey and his Arab cavalry]
Dinner party, left to right: Nuri Pasha, Auda Abu Tayi, Emir Feisal, Lowell Thomas
Bedouin camp among old Turkish trenches
Emir Feisal and Lowell Thomas using field glasses to watch a battle at Maan
Arab regular army drawn up at foot of hill
Three armored cars in silhouette at sunset [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Armored cars in holy Arabia]
Armored cars and motor trucks in front of tents at Gueira
Arab battery in action, sunset, fighting near Damascus [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Lawrence’s mountain guns in action]
Harry Chase taking motion pictures from armored car [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Mr. Chase opening fire with his cinema camera from the turret of an armored car]
Bedouin cavalry and British armored cars in desert, Lowell Thomas seated at center
General Nuri Pasha with staff and flag
Automobile in wildest Arabia, [Lowell Thomas? with back to camera seated on hood of the auto]
General Nuri Pasha and staff greeting Lowell Thomas [Lowell Thomas fourth from left]
Squadron of armored cars in front of cliff
Mountains of Edom near Petra, Lowell Thomas’s caravan in foreground [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Our caravan approaching the “Lost City”]
Mountains of Edom, sunset, Bedouin in foreground
Mountains of Edom, sunset [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Sunset over the mountain of Edom]
Mountains of Edom, sunset, near view
Valley twelve miles wide running toward Petra
Arab officer on horse at Fountain of Moses
Lowell Thomas having tea at Wadi Musa
Roman soldiers’ tomb [Lowell Thomas? with back to camera seated on rock] [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: “The tomb of the Roman soldiers”]
Temple of Isis (The Deir) from gorge, Arab in foreground, Petra [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: A rose-red temple carved like a cameo from the face of the mountain
Temple of Isis (The Deir) from gorge, Petra
Temple of Isis (The Deir), Lowell Thomas and others at foot of columns, Petra
Temple of Isis (The Deir), looking out through columns from one side, soldiers in foreground, Petra
Temple of Isis (The Deir), close-up of three columns, Petra
In gorge approaching Petra, man sitting in foreground
Temple of Isis (The Deir), camels among columns, Petra [Lowell Thomas? seated on camel at left]
Lowell Thomas on camel under column at the Temple of Isis (The Deir), Petra [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: We rode into the Auditorium on our camels]
Temple of Isis (The Deir), bushes in foreground, Petra [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: “Pharaoh’s Temple” or the “Temple of Isis”]
Lowell Thomas drinking in a gorge near Petra [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: The narrow defile that leads to the “Lost City”]
Man on camel in gorge near Petra
Harry Chase in front of tent, Petra [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Chase reads the Koran while Mohammed in the background takes aim at a circling hawk]
Harry Chase in front of tent, Petra [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Chase reads the Koran while Mohammed in the background takes aim at a circling hawk]
Lowell Thomas taking notes in front of tent, Petra
Unfinished temples, Petra, man in foreground
Amphitheatre [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: An amphitheatre hewn out of the mountain]
Small hill covered with temples, man in foreground
Side view, amphitheatre and valley, Petra
Temple at end of bridge, distant, Petra
Temple at end of bridge, close-up, Temple of Urn, Petra
Governor’s tomb, soldier in foreground, Petra
Three men lying among flowers [Lowell Thomas on right], Petra
Lowell Thomas watches as Arabs play tag around phallic monolith, Petra
Mount Hor, three men in foreground, Petra
Arabs standing in front of tombs near camp, Petra, Lowell Thomas seated on left
Three-storied temple [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: The “Three-storied temple”]
Holy Mosque, summit of Mount Hor, Lowell Thomas in foreground, Petra
Rock waves [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: The rock seemed to swirl like watered silk]
Bedouin family living in Petra Palace
Goat’s hair curtain in a modern Bedouin Petra Palace home
Two Arab men with pistols [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: “Drinkers of the milk of war”]
Two Arab men with pistols [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: “Drinkers of the milk of war”]
The Kaaba, Mecca, crowd, fort in distance [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: The mosque of the holy Kaaba]
The Kaaba, Mecca, crowd, fort in distance (copy)
The Kaaba, Mecca, close-up (copy from book)
The Haram, Sacred Mosque, Mecca (copy from book)
Mecca, panorama of city (copy from book)
Medina, part of Mosque of Prophet (copy from book)
Small dynamited bridge [image quality very poor]
Dynamited steel bridge, Hedjaz Railway [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: One of the many bridges blown up by Lawrence’s “tulips.”]
Three Arab men, full length, front view
Arab man on railway platform, full view
Lieutenant McCall McCowen dressed as Arab
General Edmund Allenby and Emir Feisal [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Field-Marshall Viscount Allenby of Jerusalem and King Feisal of Bagdad]

Emir Feisal, T. E. Lawrence and group at Paris [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Emir Feisal, center, with General Nuri to the left and Colonel Lawrence to the right; Captain Pisani of the French mission standing directly behind the Emir
Sunset, Red Sea, silhouette of caravan
Two leaning palms, sea at sunset [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Sunset in the land of the Arabian knights]
Panorama of Akaba [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Panorama of Akaba]
Panorama of a Bedouin encampment at Akaba [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: A Bedouin encampment]
Palm trees, man carrying two buckets [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Where the hosts of Israel are said to have terminated the passage of the Red Sea]
Palm trees, sea, sunset, silhouette of man [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: Date-palms along the coral shore of Araby]
General Jafaar Pasha from Baghdad [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: General Jafaar Pasha from Bagdad]
General Jafaar Pasha from Baghdad [With Lawrence in Arabia caption: General Jafaar Pasha from Bagdad]
Street scene, men with camels, Arabia[?]
Street scene, man with camel, Arabia[?]
Street scene, man with camel, little children, Arabia[?]
Girl wearing veils over head and face, Arabia[?]
Man writing in book, woman standing beside him, Arabia[?]
Two men standing next to fence, talking, Arabia[?]
Group of men in Arab dress, Arabia[?]
Group of men, man on horse in foreground, Arabia[?]
Two automobiles on road through mountains, people standing outside first automobile, Arabia[?]
People in Arab headdresses nearby a truck, Arabia[?]
Man smoking pipe, cacti, building in distance, Arabia[?]
Soldiers on horses in front of fort, Arabia[?]
Street scene, people with bundles on heads, Arabia[?]
